subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which ruler is associated with the formation of present-day Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की वर्तमान के निर्माता कौन से हैंसे संबंधित है।
explanation_en: Sawai Jai Singh II is associated with the formation of present-day Rajasthan as the founder of Jaipur, the capital city.
